data.product_name: UnbuckleMe - Makes it Easy to Unbuckle a Child's Car Seat - As Seen on Shark Tank - Easy Buckle Release Tool for Parents, Grandparents & Older Children (2 Pack, Black & White)

summary.topics: carseat, seat, unbuckle, buckle, work, gadget, thumb, car, button, able, arthritis, trying, it, great, use, recommend, very, child, bought, help, awkward, best, product, easy, really, hard, can, mom, with, he, simple, ha, this, over, nail, my, doe, drop, him, in, for, on, love, well, having, himself, have, and is

durable.review: My child was not able to use this to unbuckle himself and he is 4.  That was what I had hoped for. It does work well if you are having trouble yourself trying to unbuckle the seat but I wasnt having that issue. It does appear to be a sturdy tool and I dont see it easily breaking.

easy.review: This is a really simple product that does exactly what it is supposed to.  I hated the price, but it delivered and in the end, that was most important.
Yay no more thumb pain and my nails don't break simple just put it over the buckle and boom open carseat great if you have little ones
Say hello to kept nails! Ladies with this you dont have to worry about loosing a nail trying to free your child! Its a simple fix to a bad situation.

quality.review: Works great! With my longer nails, I can never get the carseat button unfastened.. this is a life saver!

I'm pleased with the Unbuckle Me seat belt release.  Seems durable and easy to use.  It will be great especially this winter when I don't want to be fiddling with my grandson's car seat buckles in the cold.
It is easy to use and works great!  I am so glad I saw this on Shark Tank!
The BEST INVENTION!  Genius help for grandmas or anyone who has weaker fingers. They work beautifully! I recommend these 100% and more!
What a cool thing, gave it as a baby shower gift. The Mom to be. Loved it
Love this product.  My 7 year old struggles with getting himself out of the car seat.  This helps him feel more independent.  Its easy to use.  Works as designed. He is happy.  And I am happy.
Easy to use.  It really works!

carseat.review: Bought the 2 for 1, 1 for myself and 1 for my mom. Since we always have our nails done, its hard to unbuckle my daughters car seat. Now we have nothing to worry about!!!!

unbuckle.review: This is helpful for my mom who has arthritis in her hands so she can unbuckle the car seat and also so my child can unbuckle herself to assist when exiting the vehicle.
I was able to unbuckle the car seat a lot easier

I found this gadget more awkward to use than just pushing the button with my thumb. I was hoping for a little ease because the buttons hurt after buckling and unbuckling the girls several times putting them into the car, multiple times within the course of a few hours. However, I did not find this to be of much help. More awkward than anything.

LOVE this product! I've been trying to think of a way to help my son unbuckle himself in the school drop-off line. (I was having to climb over my console to help him with the crotch buckle.) This has made drop-off a breeze! He was able to get it on his very first try. I definitely recommend and would buy again!

work.review: Its very awkward to use. Kind of hard to position correctly.  But it does work well once positioned

review_types.best_review: LOVE this product! I've been trying to think of a way to help my son unbuckle himself in the school drop-off line. (I was having to climb over my console to help him with the crotch buckle.) This has made drop-off a breeze! He was able to get it on his very first try. I definitely recommend and would buy again!
review_types.worst_review: My child was not able to use this to unbuckle himself and he is 4.  That was what I had hoped for. It does work well if you are having trouble yourself trying to unbuckle the seat but I wasnt having that issue. It does appear to be a sturdy tool and I dont see it easily breaking.
